cleaned_text: Mariam Mayet-Khan, DO Family Medicine Offers Video Visits Accepts New Patients Locations for Mariam Mayet-Khan, DO - Map pinA Mount Dora - AdventHealth Medical Group Family Medicine at Mount Dora [Directions to AdventHealth Medical Group Family Medicine at Mount Dora 19735 US Highway 441](https://www.google.com/maps/search/?api=1&query=19735%20US%20Highway%20441%2C%201st%20floor%2C%20Mount%20Dora%2C%20FL%2C%2032757) 1st floor Mount Dora, FL 32757 Expertise of Mariam Mayet-Khan, DO - Video - - Biography - Mariam Mayet-Khan, DO, is a caring family medicine physician who joined AdventHealth Medical Group from the University of North Carolina/Southeastern Health in Lumberton, NC, where she completed her family medicine residency. While there, she served in multiple leadership roles and was named Family Medicine Resident of the Year. She also served as co-investigator for an important COVID-19 study. A proud UCF graduate where she majored in molecular biology and microbiology, Dr. Mayet-Khan earned her medical degree at Nova Southeastern University College of Osteopathic Medicine in Fort Lauderdale. Dr. Mayet-Khan enjoys treating patients of all ages, from newborns to seniors and everyone in between. She is committed to offering both traditional and holistic options to achieve the best possible outcomes that honor each patient's body, mind and spirit, and she feels she was called to the field of medicine to help others navigate their physical and mental well-being. Her primary goal in her practice is to foster long-lasting physician/patient relationships in order to ensure her patients receive the best care possible. She is a bilingual provider who speaks English and Urdu. - Areas Served - Mount Dora, FL - Languages Spoken - English, Urdu - Education - Nova Southeastern College of Osteopathic Medicine - Residencies - Family Medicine at Campbell University - Board Certification - Family Medicine: American Osteopathic Board of Family Physicians - Ages Accepted - ChildrenAdolescentsAdultsGeriatrics Reviews and Comments for Mariam Mayet-Khan, DO Note: Ratings are collected through our partner Press Ganey and are screened to ensure patient privacy.
